amendment.description: Amendment authorizes local school districts to sign performance agreements with the Secretary of Education to allow them to consolidate non-title I formula grant programs together.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 107-69 to allow 100 school districts in 50 states to enter into performance agreements with the Secretary which would allow school districts to be able to consolidate programs and be relieved of the requirements of those programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiberi amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 209 (Roll no. 132).
